SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS ROW_NUM , M.* FROM ( SELECT MC.MT_CT_KEY , MC.MT_INTEGRATE_KEY , MC.MT_AC_KEY , CA.AC_NM AS MT_AC_NM , MC.MT_NM , MC.MT_CT_DT , MC.MT_START_DT , MC.MT_END_DT , MC.MT_RG_INSPECT_CNT , MC.MT_IM_CD , MC.MT_SB_CT_YN , CE.EMP_NM AS SALE_EMP_NM , CE2.EMP_NM AS MNG_EMP_NM , CE3.EMP_NM AS SUPPORT_EMP_NM FROM MT_CONTRACT_TB MC, CMM_ACCOUNT_TB CA, CMM_EMPLOYEE_TB CE, CMM_EMPLOYEE_TB CE2, CMM_EMPLOYEE_TB CE3, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) AS R WHERE 1=1
AND MC.MT_CT_DT LIKE CONCAT(year(NOW()),'%')
AND MC.MT_CT_DT >= #{fromDate}
AND MC.MT_CT_DT <= #{toDate}
AND CE.EMP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchSaleEmpNm}, '%')
AND MC.MT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND CA.AC_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND MC.MT_AC_KEY = CA.AC_KEY AND MC.MT_SALE_EMP_KEY = CE.EMP_KEY AND MC.MT_MNG_EMP_KEY= CE2.EMP_KEY AND MC.MT_SUPPORT_EMP_KEY = CE3.EMP_KEY AND MC.DELETE_YN='N' ) M
ORDER BY MT_CT_DT DESC

SELECT MC.MT_CT_KEY , MC.MT_INTEGRATE_KEY , MC.MT_AC_KEY , CA.AC_NM AS MT_AC_NM , MC.MT_AC_DIRECTOR_KEY , AC_DIRECTOR_NM AS MT_AC_DIRECTOR_NM , CONCAT(AC_DIRECTOR_POSITION_NM , ' / ' , AC_DIRECTOR_MB_NUM , ' / ' , AC_DIRECTOR_EMAIL) AS AC_DIRECTOR_INFO , MC.MT_NM , MC.MT_CT_DT , MC.MT_START_DT , MC.MT_END_DT , MC.MT_RG_INSPECT_CNT , MC.MT_IM_CD , MC.MT_SB_CT_YN , MC.GB_YN , MC.MT_AMOUNT , MC.MT_PAY_TERMS , MC.REMARK , MC.MT_SALE_EMP_KEY , (SELECT EMP_NM FROM CMM_EMPLOYEE_TB WHERE EMP_KEY= MC.MT_SALE_EMP_KEY) AS SALE_EMP_NM , MC.MT_MNG_EMP_KEY , (SELECT EMP_NM FROM CMM_EMPLOYEE_TB WHERE EMP_KEY= MC.MT_MNG_EMP_KEY) AS MNG_EMP_NM , MC.MT_SUPPORT_EMP_KEY , (SELECT EMP_NM FROM CMM_EMPLOYEE_TB WHERE EMP_KEY= MC.MT_SUPPORT_EMP_KEY) AS SUPPORT_EMP_NM , (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(BILL_AMOUNT),0) FROM MT_SD_BILLING_OP_TB WHERE BILL_FK_MT_KEY=#{mtIntegrateKey} AND DELETE_YN='N') AS CALL_TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM MT_CONTRACT_TB MC, CMM_ACCOUNT_TB CA, CMM_ACCOUNT_DIRECTOR_TB AD WHERE MC.MT_INTEGRATE_KEY=#{mtIntegrateKey} AND MC.MT_AC_KEY = CA.AC_KEY AND MC.MT_AC_KEY = AD.AC_KEY AND MC.MT_AC_DIRECTOR_KEY = AD.AC_DIRECTOR_KEY AND MC.DELETE_YN='N';

SELECT MP.PRODUCT_TOTAL_AMOUNT , MP.MT_PRODUCT_CNT , SA.MT_SALES_AMOUNT_CNT , BO.MT_BACK_ORDER_CNT , BA.MT_BUY_AMOUNT_CNT FROM ( SELECT SUM(MT_PM_QUANTITY*MT_PM_UPRICE) AS PRODUCT_TOTAL_AMOUNT , COUNT(1) AS MT_PRODUCT_CNT FROM MT_PRODUCT_TB WHERE MT_INTEGRATE_KEY=#{mtIntegrateKey} AND DELETE_YN='N' ) MP , ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS MT_SALES_AMOUNT_CNT FROM MT_SALES_AMOUNT_TB WHERE MT_INTEGRATE_KEY=#{mtIntegrateKey} AND DELETE_YN='N' ) SA , ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS MT_BACK_ORDER_CNT FROM MT_BACK_ORDER_TB WHERE MT_INTEGRATE_KEY=#{mtIntegrateKey} AND DELETE_YN='N' ) BO , ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS MT_BUY_AMOUNT_CNT FROM MT_BUY_AMOUNT_TB WHERE MT_INTEGRATE_KEY=#{mtIntegrateKey} AND DELETE_YN='N' ) BA

SELECT MP.MT_PM_KEY , MP.MT_PM_FK_KEY , PM.PM_NM_CD , MP.MT_PM_DETAIL , MP.MT_PM_SERIAL_NUM , MP.MT_PM_QUANTITY , MP.MT_PM_UPRICE , MP.MT_PM_START_DT , MP.MT_PM_END_DT , MP.REMARK FROM MT_PRODUCT_TB MP, PM_PRODUCT_MNG_TB PM WHERE MP.MT_PM_FK_KEY = PM.PM_KEY AND MP.MT_INTEGRATE_KEY = #{selectIntegrateKey} AND MP.DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND PM.PM_NM_CD LIKE CONCAT(#{searchPmNmCd}, '%')
AND MP.MT_PM_SERIAL_NUM LIKE CONCAT(#{searchSerialNum}, '%')

SELECT OP.ORDER_PM_FK_KEY AS MT_PM_KEY , PM.PM_NM_CD AS PM_NM_CD , OP.ORDER_QUANTITY AS MT_PM_QUANTITY , OP.ORDER_UPRICE AS MT_PM_UPRICE , OP.ORDER_QUANTITY * OP.ORDER_UPRICE AS TOTAL_AMOUNT , OP.MT_RATE AS MT_RATE , OP.REMARK AS MT_PM_DETAIL FROM PJ_ORDER_TB PO, PJ_ORDER_PRODUCT_TB OP , PM_PRODUCT_MNG_TB PM WHERE PO.ORDER_CT_FK_KEY = #{selectIntegrateKey} AND PO.DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND PM.PM_NM_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchPmNmCd}, '%')
AND PO.PJ_ORDER_KEY = OP.PJ_ORDER_KEY AND OP.ORDER_PM_FK_KEY = PM.PM_KEY

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(MT_SALES_JAN_AMOUNT + MT_SALES_FEB_AMOUNT + MT_SALES_MAR_AMOUNT + MT_SALES_APR_AMOUNT + MT_SALES_MAY_AMOUNT + MT_SALES_JUN_AMOUNT + MT_SALES_JUL_AMOUNT + MT_SALES_AUG_AMOUNT + MT_SALES_SEP_AMOUNT + MT_SALES_OCT_AMOUNT + MT_SALES_NOV_AMOUNT + MT_SALES_DEC_AMOUNT),0) AS MT_SALES_TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM MT_SALES_AMOUNT_TB WHERE MT_INTEGRATE_KEY = #{mtIntegrateKey} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT MT_INTEGRATE_KEY , MT_SALES_KEY , MT_SALES_YEAR , IFNULL(MT_SALES_JAN_AMOUNT, 0) AS MT_SALES_JAN_AMOUNT , IFNULL(MT_SALES_FEB_AMOUNT, 0) AS MT_SALES_FEB_AMOUNT , IFNULL(MT_SALES_MAR_AMOUNT, 0) AS MT_SALES_MAR_AMOUNT , IFNULL(MT_SALES_APR_AMOUNT, 0) AS MT_SALES_APR_AMOUNT , IFNULL(MT_SALES_MAY_AMOUNT, 0) AS MT_SALES_MAY_AMOUNT , IFNULL(MT_SALES_JUN_AMOUNT, 0) AS MT_SALES_JUN_AMOUNT , IFNULL(MT_SALES_JUL_AMOUNT, 0) AS MT_SALES_JUL_AMOUNT , IFNULL(MT_SALES_AUG_AMOUNT, 0) AS MT_SALES_AUG_AMOUNT , IFNULL(MT_SALES_SEP_AMOUNT, 0) AS MT_SALES_SEP_AMOUNT , IFNULL(MT_SALES_OCT_AMOUNT, 0) AS MT_SALES_OCT_AMOUNT , IFNULL(MT_SALES_NOV_AMOUNT, 0) AS MT_SALES_NOV_AMOUNT , IFNULL(MT_SALES_DEC_AMOUNT, 0) AS MT_SALES_DEC_AMOUNT , MT_SALES_JAN_CALL_YN , MT_SALES_FEB_CALL_YN , MT_SALES_MAR_CALL_YN , MT_SALES_APR_CALL_YN , MT_SALES_MAY_CALL_YN , MT_SALES_JUN_CALL_YN , MT_SALES_JUL_CALL_YN , MT_SALES_AUG_CALL_YN , MT_SALES_SEP_CALL_YN , MT_SALES_OCT_CALL_YN , MT_SALES_NOV_CALL_YN , MT_SALES_DEC_CALL_YN FROM MT_SALES_AMOUNT_TB WHERE MT_INTEGRATE_KEY = #{mtIntegrateKey} AND DELETE_YN='N' ORDER BY MT_SALES_YEAR

SELECT MB.MT_ORDER_KEY AS mtOrderKey , MB.MT_INTEGRATE_KEY AS mtIntegrateKey , MB.MT_ORDER_AC_KEY AS mtOrderAcKey , CA.AC_NM AS mtOrderAcKeyNm , MB.MT_ORDER_AC_DIRECTOR_KEY AS mtOrderAcDirectorKey , AD.AC_DIRECTOR_NM AS mtOrderAcDirectorNm , MB.MT_ORDER_PAY_TERMS AS mtOrderPayTerms , MB.MT_ORDER_AMOUNT AS mtOrderAmount , MB.MT_ORDER_DT AS mtOrderDt , MB.REMARK AS remark , MB.YET_PAYMENT_AMOUNT AS yetPaymentAmount , MB.DONE_PAYMENT_AMOUNT AS donePaymentAmount FROM MT_BACK_ORDER_TB MB , CMM_ACCOUNT_TB CA, CMM_ACCOUNT_DIRECTOR_TB AD WHERE MB.MT_INTEGRATE_KEY = #{mtIntegrateKey} AND MB.DELETE_YN='N' AND MB.MT_ORDER_AC_KEY = CA.AC_KEY AND MB.MT_ORDER_AC_KEY = AD.AC_KEY AND MB.MT_ORDER_AC_DIRECTOR_KEY = AD.AC_DIRECTOR_KEY
